segments.text: Good morning , sir ! Please know some about our latest products .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are our products . Please come in and have a look . This is the catalogue for our products .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have your name card ? I am always concerned about the newest computer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you sit down and write down your name and address here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ! Would you like to recommend some for our reference ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is the latest design for our products . The design of I-series keeps the fashion in a close way . The sales volume of the new product is about 50,000 per month . And we received many orders from many clothes companies . New functions and attractive outlook are the key points for our products .
segments.speaker: S1
